QUERY_DB.description: Enter your database URI in the following format <mysql/postgres>://<username>:<password>@<host>:<port>/<database>

ADMIN_USERNAME.description: User name for the default admin user

ADMIN_PASS.description: Password for the default admin user. Do not share this passwords with ither users. You can create new users from the admin page and generate credentials for the new users

JWT_KEY.description: (Optional) This is the shared private key that will be used to decode the JWT token. This is required for optionally enabling JWT Authentication mechanism that would enable the user to login via an access token parameter in the url or request body. Refer the squealy documentation for more information on setting up JWT Authentication.

AWS_ATHENA_S3_STAGING_DIR.description: (Optional) For AWS Athena users only. Enter the staging directory path on S3. This is where the results of the queries get saved. For example, s3://query-results-bucket/folder/

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: (Optional) Required for authorizing requests to AWS Athena. Make sure you have the required IAM permissions to execute queries on AWS Athena.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: (Optional) Required for authorizing requests to AWS Athena

AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.description: (Optional) AWS region for AWS Athena. By default, us-east-1 will be used.

EMAIL_HOST.description: (Optional) The following settings are required for setting up scheduled reports sent over emails. Enter the Email HostName here. Example - smtp.gmail.com
